name: oauth2-linkedin
description: Serverside Oauth2 LinkedIn Signin using Node.js

scripts.coveralls: NODE_ENV=test node --harmony node_modules/istanbul-harmony/lib/cli.js cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --dir test/coverage  -- -u exports -R spec lib/*.spec.js && cat ./test/coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js
